name: Elizaveta: A Folk Tale DEMO
description:
This is just a demo, meant as proof of concept or whatever jargon game designers use.

We're making a series of games that cover the 'history' of a 'game series' that didn't actually exist. Starting with a NES/Famicom era side scroller moving through the ages to eventually release a modern retelling of the classic NES game. (That, again, didn't even actually exist until we made it just now.)

This demo is for the 'JRPG-Style' spin off for a game series, that again, isn't real. It'll make more sense in time, I'm sure.

In the meantime, enjoy this little demo.
